Documentation of the API¶

This is the user manual for the Python bindings to the spsa library.

spsa¶

StochasticProcessConstructor

Class to create up to 4-dimensional gaussian processes.

SobolIndicesStochasticProcessAlgorithm

Base class for sensitivity analysis, without usage of the inputDesign.

StochasticProcessSensitivityAnalysis

Custom class to do sensitivity analysis on complex models

StochasticProcessSensitivityExperiment

Class to generate experiments for the sensitivity analysis.
